Name: STONE COLD STEVE AUSTIN
Superstar Ability: Once during your turn, you may draw a card, but you must then take a card from your hand and place it on the bottom of your Arsenal.

Name: THE UNDERTAKER
Superstar Ability: Once during your turn, you may discard 2 cards to the Ringside pile and take 1 card from the Ringside pile and place it into your hand.

Name: MANKIND
Superstar Ability: You must always draw 2 cards, if possible, during your draw segment. All damage from opponent is at -1D.

Name: HHH
Superstar Ability: None, isn't the starting hand size enough! He is "The Game" after all!

Name: THE ROCK
Superstar Ability: At the start of your turn, before your draw segment, you may take 1 card from your Ringside pile and place it on the bottom of your Arsenal.

Name: KANE
Superstar Ability: At the start of your turn, before your draw segment, opponent must take the top card from his Arsenal and place it into his Ringside pile.

Name: CHRIS JERICHO
Superstar Ability: Once during your turn, you may discard a card from your hand to force your opponent to discard a card from his hand.
